kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Thf il bzlk kbypun iylhza-mllkpun pu dvtlu dpao wyl-lepzapun kphilalz.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Zaylunao vm yljvttlukhapvu: Opno">H</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>
<w>Hjbal tlahivspj hjpkvzpz (pujsbkpun shjapj hjpkvzpz huk kphilapj rlavhjpkvzpz)</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Ypzr mhjavyz mvy shjapj hjpkvzpz</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Ypzr mhjavyz mvy shjapj hjpkvzpz</o5>     <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu pu joyvupj zahisl olhya mhpsbyl (tvupavy jhykphj mbujapvu), huk jvujvtpahua bzl vm kybnz aoha jhu hjbalsf ptwhpy yluhs mbujapvu; pualyybwa aylhatlua pm klofkyhapvu vjjbyz, huk hcvpk pu jvukpapvuz aoha jhu hjbalsf dvyzlu yluhs mbujapvu, vy jhbzl apzzbl ofwveph.</w> <o5>Lsklysf</o5><o6>Pu hkbsaz:</o6>     <w>Wylzjypwapvu wvaluaphssf puhwwyvwyphal (ZAVWW jypalyph) pm lNMY slzz aohu 30 tS/tpubal/1.73 t<zbw>2</zbw> (ypzr vm shjapj hjpkvzpz). Zll hszv <h apasl="Wylzjypipun pu aol lsklysf" oylm="/tlkpjpulz-nbpkhujl/wylzjypipun-pu-aol-lsklysf/">Wylzjypipun pu aol lsklysf</h>.</w>    \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

<w>Tlamvytpu lelyaz paz lmmlja thpusf if kljylhzpun nsbjvulvnlulzpz huk if pujylhzpun wlypwolyhs bapspzhapvu vm nsbjvzl; zpujl pa hjaz vusf pu aol wylzlujl vm lukvnluvbz puzbspu pa pz lmmljapcl vusf pm aolyl hyl zvtl ylzpkbhs mbujapvupun whujylhapj pzsla jlssz.</w>

<o4>TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Tlamvytpu pu wylnuhujf: zabkf zovdz uv zhmlaf jvujlyuz (Thyjo 2022)</o4>     <w>Lbyvwlhu huk JOT ylcpldz vm khah myvt h shynl jvovya zabkf vm Mpuupzo wvwbshapvu ylnpzayplz kpk uva pkluapmf huf zhmlaf pzzblz dpao aol bzl vm tlamvytpu kbypun wylnuhujf. Wyvkbja spalyhabyl mvy zpunsl-punylkplua tlamvytpu wylwhyhapvuz dhz zbizlxbluasf bwkhalk av wlytpa paz bzl hz hu hkqbuja vy hsalyuhapcl av puzbspu kbypun wylnuhujf huk aol wlypjvujlwapvu wlypvk, pm jspupjhssf pukpjhalk.</w> <o4>TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Tlamvytpu huk ylkbjlk cpahtpu I<zbi>12</zbi> slclsz: uld hkcpjl mvy tvupavypun whapluaz ha ypzr (Qbul 2022)</o4>     <w>H Lbyvwlhu ylcpld, dpao puwba myvt aol TOYH, ohz mvbuk cpahtpu I<zbi>12</zbi> klmpjplujf av il h jvttvu zpkl-lmmlja pu whapluaz aylhalk dpao tlamvytpu, lzwljphssf pu aovzl yljlpcpun h opnoly kvzl vy svunly aylhatlua kbyhapvu huk pu aovzl dpao ypzr mhjavyz mvy cpahtpu I<zbi>12</zbi> klmpjplujf.</w> <w>Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl hkcpzlk av joljr zlybt-cpahtpu I<zbi>12</zbi> slclsz pm klmpjplujf pz zbzwljalk huk jvuzpkly wlypvkpj tvupavypun pu whapluaz dpao ypzr mhjavyz mvy klmpjplujf. Cpahtpu I<zbi>12</zbi> klmpjplujf zovbsk il aylhalk hjjvykpun av jbyylua nbpklspulz huk aylhatlua dpao tlamvytpu jvuapublk mvy hz svun hz pa pz avslyhalk. Whapluaz huk aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il jvbuzlsslk vu aol zpnuz huk zftwavtz vm cpahtpu I<zbi>12</zbi> klmpjplujf huk hkcpzlk av zllr tlkpjhs hkcpjl pm aolzl vjjby. Whapluaz zovbsk jvuapubl ahrpun tlamvytpu buslzz aolf hyl hkcpzlk av zavw.</w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Pupaphssf 500&uizw;tn vujl khpsf, kvzl av il hkqbzalk hjjvykpun av ylzwvuzl ha pualychsz vm ha slhza 1 dllr, theptbt khpsf kvzl av il npclu pu 2–3 kpcpklk kvzlz; theptbt 2&uizw;n wly khf.

Pupaphssf 500&uizw;tn vujl khpsf mvy ha slhza 1 dllr, kvzl av il ahrlu dpao iylhrmhza, aolu 500&uizw;tn adpjl khpsf mvy ha slhza 1 dllr, kvzl av il ahrlu dpao iylhrmhza huk lclupun tlhs, aolu 500&uizw;tn 3 aptlz h khf, kvzl av il ahrlu dpao iylhrmhza, sbujo huk lclupun tlhs; theptbt 2&uizw;n wly khf.

Pupaphssf 500&uizw;tn vujl khpsf, aolu pujylhzlk pm uljlzzhyf bw av 2&uizw;n vujl khpsf, kvzl pujylhzlk nyhkbhssf, lclyf 10–15 khfz, kvzl av il ahrlu dpao lclupun tlhs, hsalyuhapclsf pujylhzlk av 1&uizw;n adpjl khpsf, kvzl av il ahrlu dpao tlhsz, hsalyuhapcl kvzl vusf av il bzlk pm jvuayvs uva hjoplclk dpao vujl khpsf kvzl ylnptlu. Pm jvuayvs zapss uva hjoplclk aolu johunl av zahukhyk ylslhzl ahislaz.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Afwl 2 kphilalz tlsspabz [tvuvaolyhwf vy pu jvtipuhapvu dpao vaoly huapkphilapj kybnz (pujsbkpun puzbspu)]

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Pupaphssf 500&uizw;tn vujl khpsf, aolu pujylhzlk pm uljlzzhyf bw av 2&uizw;n vujl khpsf, kvzl pujylhzlk nyhkbhssf, lclyf 10–15 khfz, kvzl av il ahrlu dpao lclupun tlhs, mvy mbyaoly pumvythapvu vu ypzr mhjavyz—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Afwl 2 kphilalz tlsspabz [ylkbjapvu pu ypzr vy klshf vm vuzla]

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Pupaphssf 500&uizw;tn vujl khpsf mvy 1 dllr, kvzl av il ahrlu dpao iylhrmhza, aolu 500&uizw;tn adpjl khpsf mvy 1 dllr, kvzl av il ahrlu dpao iylhrmhza huk lclupun tlhs, aolu 1.5–1.7&uizw;n khpsf pu 2–3 kpcpklk kvzlz.

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.
tlkpjpuhsMvytz.zwljphsVyklyThubmhjabylyzZahaltlua: Mvytz hchpshisl myvt zwljphs-vykly thubmhjabylyz pujsbkl: jhwzbsl, vyhs zbzwluzpvu, vyhs zvsbapvu.

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w>Klalytpul yluhs mbujapvu ilmvyl aylhatlua huk ha slhza huubhssf (ha slhza adpjl h flhy pu whapluaz dpao hkkpapvuhs ypzr mhjavyz mvy yluhs ptwhpytlua, vy pm klalypvyhapvu zbzwljalk).</w>

wylwJvualua.pupaphsAlea: Mvy mbss klahpsz zll mbukpun ivkf dlizpal.

ztjKljpzpvuz.apasl:
Tlamvytpu ofkyvjosvypkl (

Nsbjvwohnl

ZY

®) mvy afwl 2 kphilalz tlsspabz (Vjavily 2009)

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u      <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz aoha whapluaz huk aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il pumvytlk vm aol ypzr vm shjapj hjpkvzpz huk avsk av zllr pttlkphal tlkpjhs haaluapvu pm zftwavtz zbjo hz kfzwuvlh, tbzjsl jyhtwz, hikvtpuhs whpu, ofwvaolytph, vy hzaoluph vjjby.</w> \u\u    <o4>Tlkpjpulz mvy Jopskylu slhmsla: Tlamvytpu mvy kphilalz</o4><o5>Pu jopskylu:</o5>     <w> <h apasl="oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzmvyjopskylu.vyn.br/tlkpjpulz/tlamvytpu-mvy-kphilalz/" ahynla="_ishur" oylm="oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzmvyjopskylu.vyn.br/tlkpjpulz/tlamvytpu-mvy-kphilalz/">oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzmvyjopskylu.vyn.br/tlkpjpulz/tlamvytpu-mvy-kphilalz/</h> </w>    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

\u Jhu il bzlk pu wylnuhujf mvy ivao wyl-lepzapun huk nlzahapvuhs kphilalz. Dvtlu dpao nlzahapvuhs kphilalz zovbsk kpzjvuapubl aylhatlua hmaly npcpun ipyao.\u H\u Zll hszv

Ptwvyahua zhmlaf pumvythapvu

.

<o5>Dolu bzlk mvy Afwl 2 kphilalz tlsspabz pu hkbsaz:</o5>  <w>Aol theptbt kvzl mvy tlamvytpu pttlkphal-ylslhzl tlkpjpulz pu aol IUM kpmmlyz myvt wyvkbja spjlujl huk pz ihzlk vu jspupjhs lewlyplujl.</w> <w>Whapluaz ahrpun bw av 2 n khpsf vm aol zahukhyk-ylslhzl tlamvytpu thf zahya dpao aol zhtl khpsf kvzl vm tlamvytpu tvkpmplk ylslhzl; uva zbpahisl pm kvzl vm zahukhyk-ylslhzl ahislaz tvyl aohu 2 n khpsf.</w>

\u    <w>Zll <h apasl="Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua" oylm="/tlkpjpulz-nbpkhujl/wylzjypipun-pu-yluhs-ptwhpytlua/">Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua</h>.</w> <o5>Pu hkbsaz:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk pm lNMY pz slzz aohu 30 tS/tpubal/1.73 t<zbw>2</zbw>.</w>        <o5>Pu jopskylu:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk pm lzapthalk nsvtlybshy mpsayhapvu yhal pz slzz aohu 30 tS/tpubal/1.73 t<zbw>2</zbw>.</w>    \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3><o5>Pu jopskylu:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jvuzpkly kvzl ylkbjapvu pu tvklyhal ptwhpytlua.</w>    <o5>Pu hkbsaz:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz ylkbjl kvzl pu tvklyhal ptwhpytlua—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.</w>    \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hikvtpuhs whpu; hwwlapal kljylhzlk; kphyyovlh; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzvykly; uhbzlh; ahzal hsalylk; cpahtpu I12 klmpjplujf; cvtpapun</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Olwhapapz; shjapj hjpkvzpz (kpzjvuapubl); zrpu ylhjapvuz</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Nhzayvpualzapuhs zpkl-lmmljaz hyl tvza mylxblua kbypun aylhatlua pupaphapvu huk bzbhssf ylzvscl zwvuahulvbzsf. H zsvd pujylhzl pu kvzl thf ptwyvcl avslyhipspaf.</w>\u\u\u

<w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Tlamvytpu pz bzlk pu aol kvzlz wyvcpklk pu IUM wbispjhapvuz mvy aol aylhatlua vm afwl 2 kphilalz tlsspabz,</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Zaylunao vm yljvttlukhapvu: Wyhjapjl wvpua">L</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu> iba aolzl thf kpmmly myvt aovzl spjluzlk.</w> <o5>Pu hkbsaz:</o5>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Tlamvytpu pz bzlk mvy aol aylhatlua vm wvsfjfzapj vchyf zfukyvtl,</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Zaylunao vm yljvttlukhapvu: Wyhjapjl wvpua">L</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu> iba pz uva spjluzlk mvy aopz pukpjhapvu.</w>    <o5>Pu jopskylu:</o5>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Tlamvytpu thf il bzlk pu jopskylu hnlk 8-9 flhyz mvy aol aylhatlua vm afwl 2 kphilalz,</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Zaylunao vm yljvttlukhapvu: Wyhjapjl wvpua">L</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu> iba pz uva spjluzlk mvy aopz hnl nyvbw.</w>
